name: Puzzle of Santa Girl VR
description:
Welcome to Santa Girl's Secret House. Solve Santa Girl's puzzles and Get the Gifts!

There Are 3 Type Of Puzzles.

  • Catch the Santa Girl
  • Count the Santa Girls
  • Spot the Differences

And there Are 2 Types, 12 Gifts In total.

Each time you clear the puzzle's stage, you cab get the new gift!

In VR World, Everyday Christmas. OPEN THE DOOR !!
